name: places/ChIJ4Z-PC4j2wokR33hMtJFx9Bg
adrFormatAddress: 3653 Broadway, New York, NY 10031-2510, USA

originalText.text: Awful job, I got a bumpy and crooked nails. So disappointing, I will try my best to ignore it until I’m ready for a new manicure.

text.text: Awful job, I got a bumpy and crooked nails. So disappointing, I will try my best to ignore it until I’m ready for a new manicure.

originalText.text: DO NOT GO HERE! the lady in the back (furthest down) is TERRIBLE! she is very inexperienced and mean when i didn’t like my nails she claimed it was because i didn’t do gel and i didn’t have enough money to do so. she was very disrespectful and rude to me when I asked her to fix my nails and kept going on about how i didn’t have enough money for gel. the problem wasn’t the gel. it was that they looked bad. there was zero professionalism and her station was gross and dirty. thankfully the lady T the front fixed my nails but i still wasn’t satisfied. i had to go back home and fix it im so mad i wasted my money here. DO NOT GO!!!

DO NOT GO!!!

originalText.text: I had a fantastic experience at this nail salon! The white & blue full set nails they did for me turned out absolutely adorable. The staff who was skilled and friendly could easily get my thoughts. I'll definitely be coming back for more nail art!

text.text: I had a fantastic experience at this nail salon! The white & blue full set nails they did for me turned out absolutely adorable. The staff who was skilled and friendly could easily get my thoughts. I'll definitely be coming back for more nail art!

originalText.text: My 2nd time coming here I went to the lady on the furthest end towards the back. She was extremely rough and left me bleeding. I asked for a manicure with a clear gel. I previously went to them to get the same so I still had gel from the last time I visited. She did not completely remove the gel and applied the new gel as you can see it’s still prevalent in some of the nails. I do not recommend this place as I signaled the lady that did my nails the last time to give the current lady a better understand, she proclaims it’s just my nail. I told her I came to you last time and this did not occur. She just waves me off. They still charged me $33. I gave her 30 and she waved me off as well. Very unprofessional. Go to someone else this place may be cheaper but it’s not worth it.

originalText.text:
Worst pedicure I have gotten in at least 10 years.  Woman jammed cuticle pusher with a huge amount of force, did not make my nails even, only trimmed cuticles on one side & then clearly talked about me to the woman next to her when I asked her to do the other side, barely "pumiced" my heels, left nail polish on my skin, and didn't apply a top coat.  The best thing I can say is it was so fast, I was done, including drying, in about 1/2 hour.
I paid the $23 and when I gave her the $5 she gave me back and asked for the change, she tried to keep the whole $5.  I still tipped her $4, since I know they are under paid, but in what world would such a sub-standard job deserve over 20%?
This is not a satisfactory job.  I suck at doing my own nails, but even I do a better job than this.
